import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update issue type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/issues/types/{issueTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing issue type definition by ID. Use this to rename a type, change its scope, or update product/site associations.

**Prerequisites**
1. **issueTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/issues/types](/docs/api/issues/list-issue-types) or [POST /api/v1.0/issues/types](/docs/api/issues/search-issue-types) and extract `Items[].IssueTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load the current type: [GET /api/v1.0/issues/types/\{issueTypeId\}](/docs/api/issues/get-issue-type-by-id).
2. Modify fields in the `IssueType` payload.
3. Save changes: [POST /api/v1.0/issues/types/\{issueTypeId\}](/docs/api/issues/update-issue-type).

**Minimal Required Fields**: issueTypeId (path) plus at least one field to update (commonly `Name` or `Scope`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"issueTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"IssueTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site","Personal","GlobalOnly","Aggregate"]},"Name":{"type":"string"},"OriginId":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"OriginSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"example":{"SiteId":"e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-e5f6-a7b8c9d01234","ProductId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-a1b2-c3d4e5f67890","IssueTypeId":"b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-b2c3-d4e5f6a78901","Scope":"Global","Name":"Hardware Failure"},"title":"IssueType"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
